---
title: "Music"
---

I played flute in my middle school band, high school marching band, wind ensmeble, full orchestra, <a href=https://www.tmea.org/band/>TMEA</a> Region Band, Orchestra, and All-State Band. 

At CMU, I was lucky to continue playing as part of the <a href=http://alluniversityorchestra.org/>All-University Orchestra</a>. 


## Concerts 

<a href=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dvD4Ui486otI8z9Y8t4mGvf_C-h4lSAMFyK0NxQa6wM/edit?usp=sharing>Here</a> is a very rough list-in-progress of concerts I have played in or attended. I am looking forward to adding concerts from ensembles in and around Philadelphia.
